arrayContent.label: Link
arrayContent.name: href
arrayContent.helpText: URL to which you will redirect when you click the icon.

arrayContent.label: Title
arrayContent.name: title
arrayContent.helpText: Title attribute of the previous link.

arrayContent.label: Target
arrayContent.name: target
arrayContent.helpText: Choose the opening mode when you click on the icon.

arrayContent.label: Icon Type
arrayContent.name: iconType
arrayContent.helpText: Type of icon you can use. You can choose between using Font Awesome or Material.

arrayContent.label: Icon Code
arrayContent.name: iconCode
arrayContent.helpText: You must add the code of the icon you wish to display. In each of the pages of the previous icon libraries you can see the available codes.

arrayContent.label: Icon Color(Hex Code with #)
arrayContent.name: iconColor
arrayContent.helpText: Customize the color of the icon by entering a hexadecimal code.
